measure.name: Number of measured events in a day
measure.query: SELECT TIME_FORMAT(TIME_STAMP, '%h %p') as 'time of the day' ,count(MESSAGE.REMARKS) as 'measured events' FROM SERVICE LEFT JOIN REGISTERED_AT ON SERVICE.AGENT_ID = REGISTERED_AT.AGENT_ID JOIN MESSAGE on SOURCE_AGENT=SERVICE.AGENT_ID where SERVICE_PATH="sensorProxy" and EVENT like "%custom%" group by TIME_FORMAT(TIME_STAMP, '%h %p')

visualization.nodeId: chartNode
visualization.title: Number of measured events in a day

measure.name: Measured mood of participants during the day
measure.query: select TIME_FORMAT(TIME_STAMP, '%h:%i %p') as time, AVG(JSON_EXTRACT(REMARKS,"$.rawMeasurement[1].r")) as 'measured mood' from MESSAGE where EVENT= "SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_2" AND REMARKS->>"$.rawMeasurement" is not null group by time

visualization.nodeId: chartNode
visualization.title: Average mood over time

measure.name: Measure name Number of bots
measure.query: select TIME_FORMAT(TIME_STAMP, '%h:%i %p') as time, AVG(JSON_EXTRACT(REMARKS,"$.rawMeasurement[1].r")) as 'measured mood' from MESSAGE where EVENT= "SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_2" AND REMARKS->>"$.rawMeasurement" is not null group by time

visualization.nodeId: chartNode
visualization.title: Average mood over time

measure.name: Distribution of measurents containing user feedback on their mood
measure.query: select feedback, count(*) from (SELECT CASE WHEN JSON_LENGTH(REMARKS->>'$.moodEvaluation')>0 THEN 'feedback' ELSE 'no feedback' END AS feedback, REMARKS->>"$.userID" FROM MESSAGE where REMARKS->>"$.rawMeasurement" is not null ) as t group by feedback;

visualization.nodeId: chartNode
visualization.title: Average mood over time

measure.name: Number of users taking measurements in the past 24 hours
measure.query: select count(distinct REMARKS->>"$.userID") as 'Number of active users' from MESSAGE where timediff(current_time(),TIME(TIME_STAMP))<'24:00:00' AND EVENT like "%SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_%" AND REMARKS->>"$.rawMeasurement" is not null

measure.name: Number of users taking part in the current study
measure.query: select count(distinct REMARKS->>"$.userID") as 'number of users' from MESSAGE where EVENT like "%SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_%" AND REMARKS->>"$.rawMeasurement" is not null

measure.name: Number of users in the past 24 hours
measure.query: SELECT count(distinct REMARKS->>"$.actor.account.name") as user FROM MESSAGE where EVENT ="SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_96" and timediff(current_time(),TIME(TIME_STAMP))<'24:00:00'

measure.name: Busiest day
measure.query: select concat('On ' ,date, ' a total of ',users, ' users used the service') from(SELECT DATE(TIME_STAMP) as date,count(distinct REMARKS->>"$.actor.account.name") as users FROM MESSAGE where REMARKS->>"$.verb.id" like "%compared_words%" AND EVENT ="SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_96" group by date order by users desc ) as t limit 1

measure.name: Number of users doing the association task per day
measure.query: SELECT TIME_STAMP as date,count(distinct REMARKS->>"$.actor.account.name") as 'number of users' FROM MESSAGE where REMARKS->>"$.verb.id" like "%compared_words%" AND EVENT ="SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_96" group by date(TIME_STAMP)

visualization.nodeId: chartNode
visualization.title: Number of users doing association

measure.name: Top 5 topics
measure.query: SELECT REMARKS->>'$.object.definition.description."en-US"' as topic , count(*) FROM MESSAGE where EVENT ="SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_96" AND REMARKS->>"$.verb.id" like "%compared_words%" group by topic order by count(topic) desc limit 5

visualization.nodeId: chartNode
visualization.title: Number of users doing association

measure.name: Distribution of scores for association task
measure.query: select concat('Acheived score : ',score, '/5') as score, n from (SELECT REMARKS->>'$.context.extensions."https://tech4comp.de/xapi/context/extensions/filecontent".score' as score , count(*) as n FROM MESSAGE where EVENT ="SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_96" AND REMARKS->>"$.verb.id" like "%compared_words%" group by score) as t

visualization.nodeId: chartNode
visualization.title: Distribution of scores for association task

measure.name: Average number of submissions per task
measure.description: This shows the top 5 submissions per task
measure.query: SELECT REMARKS->>'$.object.definition.name."en-US"' as task, count(*) as n FROM MESSAGE where EVENT ="SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_33" and REMARKS->>"$.verb.id" like "%sent_file%" group by task order by n desc limit 5

visualization.nodeId: undefined
visualization.title: undefined

measure.name: Most handed in task
measure.query: select concat(task,' is the most submitted task, with ',n ,' submissions') from (SELECT REMARKS->>'$.object.definition.name."en-US"' as task ,count(*) as n FROM MESSAGE where EVENT ="SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_33" and REMARKS->>"$.verb.id" like "%sent_file%" group by task order by n desc) as q limit 1

measure.name: Time of task submissions
measure.query: SELECT TIME_FORMAT(TIME_STAMP, '%H:00-%H:59') as time ,count(*) as n FROM MESSAGE where EVENT ="SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_33" and REMARKS->>"$.verb.id" like "%sent_file%" group by time order by time

visualization.nodeId: chartNode
visualization.title: Time of task submissions

measure.name: Number of active students
measure.query: SELECT count( distinct REMARKS->>'$.actor.account.name') as n FROM MESSAGE where EVENT ="SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_33" AND timediff(current_time(),TIME(TIME_STAMP))<'24:00:00' and REMARKS->>"$.verb.id" like "%sent_file%"

measure.name: Submissions over time
measure.query: SELECT TIME_STAMP as date, count(*) FROM MESSAGE where EVENT ="SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_33" and REMARKS->>"$.verb.id" like "%sent_file%" group by date(date)

visualization.nodeId: undefined
visualization.title: undefined

measure.name: Total number of supported canteens
measure.query: SELECT count(distinct(name)) FROM mensas

measure.name: Time spent on chat interactions per week (per user)
measure.query: SELECT sum(time),email FROM( SELECT REMARKS->"$.time" as time, REMARKS->"$.email" as email FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_41' AND SOURCE_AGENT = '$SERVICE$' GROUP BY REMARKS->"$.email", WEEK(time_stamp) ) as T

measure.name: Process durations over time
measure.description: This chart shows how long it has taken for certain requests to finish (in seconds) over time. Values over 50s are taken out.
measure.query: SELECT TIME_STAMP AS time, CONVERT(SUBSTRING_INDEX(REMARKS->>"$.duration",'-',-1),UNSIGNED INTEGER)/1000 as duration FROM MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = "SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_40" and CONVERT(SUBSTRING_INDEX(REMARKS->>"$.duration",'-',-1),UNSIGNED INTEGER) >0 and CONVERT(SUBSTRING_INDEX(REMARKS->>"$.duration",'-',-1),UNSIGNED INTEGER) < 50000

visualization.nodeId: undefined
visualization.title: undefined

measure.name: Top rated canteens
measure.description: This measure shows the best average rated food
measure.query: SELECT mensas.name as name, avg(stars) as 'average stars' FROM mensas JOIN reviews ON mensas.id = reviews.mensaId WHERE mensas.city = "Aachen" GROUP BY mensas.name order by avg(stars) desc limit 5

visualization.nodeId: undefined
visualization.title: undefined

measure.name: Best dish categories for Mensa Academica
measure.description: This measure describes which categories of dishes are best rated at Aachen, Mensa Academica
measure.query: SELECT category, avg(stars) as 'average stars' FROM mensas JOIN reviews ON mensas.id = reviews.mensaId JOIN dishes ON dishes.id = reviews.dishId WHERE mensas.name= "Aachen, Mensa Academica" GROUP BY category order by avg(stars) desc limit 5

visualization.nodeId: undefined
visualization.title: undefined

measure.name: Top reviewers
measure.description: This measure shows the users which submitted the most reviews. One bar shows the reviews with comment and the other one those without
measure.query: SELECT author, count(case when comment is null then 1 else null end) as 'without comment', count(case when comment is not null then 1 else null end) as 'with comment'FROM reviews GROUP BY author order by count(*) desc limit 5

visualization.nodeId: undefined
visualization.title: undefined

measure.name: SUS - System Usability Scale Global Score

measure.name: Favourite hours of the last year
measure.query: SELECT CONCAT( LPAD(DATE_FORMAT(TIME_STAMP, "%H"), 2, '0'), ':00-', LPAD(DATE_FORMAT(TIME_STAMP + INTERVAL 1 HOUR, "%H"), 2, '0'), ':00' ) as time_range, COUNT(*) as requests FROM MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = "SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_1" AND TIME_STAMP > (DATE_SUB('2023-08-07', INTERVAL 12 MONTH))GROUP BY time_range ORDER BY time_range ASC;

visualization.nodeId: undefined
visualization.title: undefined

measure.name: Recommondations requests of the last 7 days
measure.query: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(TIME_STAMP, "%M %d %Y") as date, count(*) as requests FROM MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = "SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_51" AND TIME_STAMP > ('2022-06-07' - INTERVAL 7 DAY) GROUP BY date ORDER BY TIME_STAMP ASC

visualization.nodeId: undefined
visualization.title: undefined

measure.name: Keyword search requests of the last 7 days
measure.query: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(TIME_STAMP, "%M %d %Y") as date, count(*) as requests FROM MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = "SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_51" AND TIME_STAMP > ('2022-06-07' - INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND (JSON_EXTRACT(REMARKS,"$.Task") LIKE 'Keyword Search%') GROUP BY date ORDER BY TIME_STAMP ASC

visualization.nodeId: undefined
visualization.title: undefined

measure.name: Recommendation Search requests of the last 7 days
measure.query: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(TIME_STAMP, "%M %d %Y") as date, count(*) as requests FROM MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = "SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_51" AND TIME_STAMP > ('2022-06-07' - INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND (JSON_EXTRACT(REMARKS,"$.Task") LIKE 'Recommendation Search%') GROUP BY date ORDER BY TIME_STAMP ASC

measure.name: Average process time of not-service-related answers of the CitationBot
measure.query: SELECT AVG(JSON_EXTRACT(REMARKS,"$.Process time"))/1000 as duration FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE WHERE EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_50'

measure.name: Average process time of the last 24 hours of the CitationBot
measure.query: SELECT AVG(JSON_EXTRACT(REMARKS,"$.Process time"))/1000 as duration FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE WHERE (EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_50' OR EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_51' OR EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_52') AND TIME_STAMP > ('2022-06-07' - INTERVAL 1 DAY)

measure.name: Average process time of service requests of the last 24 hours of the CitationBot
measure.query: SELECT AVG(JSON_EXTRACT(REMARKS,"$.Process time"))/1000 as duration FROM LAS2PEERMON.MESSAGE WHERE (EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_51' OR EVENT = 'SERVICE_CUSTOM_MESSAGE_52') AND TIME_STAMP > ('2022-06-07' - INTERVAL 1 DAY)
